name: Choo Choopunk
description:
Done in 24 hours

You are running out of time!

There are several trains to reach their destination and a lot of money to earn (or lose). Manage and control the rails of the railroad tracks so that the trains reach their destination and the business doesn't go down the drain.

FEATURES

Manage the railroads by changing direction

Accumulates money for each train that arrives at its destination

Prevents them from colliding and exploding against each other

SOCIAL MEDIA

You can follow us through our social networks Twitter, Instagram and Discord where we post day-to-day updates from the studio and our main development.

CREDITS

Art: Alejandro Letosa (@alejandro.letosa) and Víctor García (@victor.blizz)

Game design: Adrián Lleyda (@huesitox_)

Programming: Daniel Torres (@tor3dartist)

Sound: Loreto Llorente (@lore_tum)

EXTRA CREDITS

Sound: Frank Serafine
